#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct interval{
	int start;
	int end;
};
bool myfunction(interval a,interval b)
{
	if(a.end<b.end)
	return true;
	if(a.end>b.end)
	return false;
	return(a.start<b.start);
}
int main()
{    int t,n,count,endtime;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{   cin>>n;
	interval*array = new interval[n];
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>array[i].start>>array[i].end;
	sort(array,array+n,myfunction);
	count=1;
	endtime=array[0].end;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(endtime<array[i].start)
		{
			count++;
			endtime=array[i].end;
		}
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
}}
